医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
伯克利实验室和基因泰克合作开发用于药物输送的新型脂质纳米颗粒许多疾病可以在细胞培养皿的简单环境中成功治疗，但为了成功治疗真人，药物必须穿越我们体内无限复杂的环境，并完好无损地到达受影响的细胞内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Berkeley-Lab-and-Genentech-collaborate-to-develop-new-lipid-nanoarticles-for-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Berkeley-Lab-and-Genentech-collaborate-to-develop-new-lipid-nanoarticles-for-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16764034-3ca1-4310-8ad8-4a6522bdba48 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 12:12:28 -0400 Berkeley Lab and Genentech collaborate to develop new lipid nanoparticles for drug delivery
Donanemab 有望减缓阿尔茨海默病随着第三种新的阿尔茨海默氏症药物预计将获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 的批准，该领域在减缓该疾病的斗争中开始显示出进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Donanemab-shows-promise-in-slowing-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Donanemab-shows-promise-in-slowing-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2afd0b66-9fef-4380-9be5-ef25773fe91c Mon, 17 Jul 2023 12:00:11 -0400 Donanemab shows promise in slowing Alzheimer's disease
研究发现脑震荡不会影响儿童智商当孩子受伤时，父母感到的焦虑无疑是为人父母的普遍状况之一。当这些伤害涉及脑震荡时，这种焦虑会大大加剧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Concussions-do-not-affect-IQ-in-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Concussions-do-not-affect-IQ-in-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcd0587c-9e4a-4e3a-bb66-4a27227c79a6 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 11:55:04 -0400 Concussions do not affect IQ in children, study finds
三管齐下的联合免疫疗法为胰腺癌患者带来了希望为可手术的胰腺癌患者提供三管齐下的联合免疫疗法，包括胰腺癌疫苗GVAX、免疫检查点疗法nivolumab和抗CD137激动剂抗体urelemab疗法，是安全的，它增加了抗癌免疫系统的数量根据约翰·霍普金斯大学研究人员指导的新研究，肿瘤中的 T 细胞在癌症切除手术前两周注射似乎有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Three-pronged-combination-immunotherapy-shows-promise-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Three-pronged-combination-immunotherapy-shows-promise-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc8778b0-8187-4bdf-a7f3-cfdab842973c Mon, 17 Jul 2023 11:50:44 -0400 Three-pronged combination immunotherapy shows promise for pancreatic cancer patients
2022 年欧洲热浪的影响：超过 60,000 人死亡研究人员估计 2022 年夏季欧洲因高温造成的死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Impact-of-the-2022-European-heat-wave-Over-60000-deaths-recorded.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Impact-of-the-2022-European-heat-wave-Over-60000-deaths-recorded.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1374623a-584a-4a4d-b728-ca92759cb272 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 10:39:00 -0400 Impact of the 2022 European heat wave: Over 60,000 deaths recorded
血清流行病学研究表明 EV-A71 疫苗在中国广州有效肠道病毒 A71 (EV-A71) 是一种重要的手足口病 (HFMD) 病原。 EV-A71灭活疫苗于2016年在中国获得批准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Seroepidemiology-study-suggests-EV-A71-vaccine- effective-in-Guangzhou-China.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Seroepidemiology-study-suggests-EV-A71-vaccine- effective-in-Guangzhou-China.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f343557-b25a-493e-ac41-70c7ad9ab088 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 10:32:11 -0400 Seroepidemiology study suggests EV-A71 vaccine effective in Guangzhou, China
研究发现，COVID-19 学校停课对巴塞罗那贫困地区的打击最为严重COVID-19 大流行袭击了教育系统。据估计，全球约有16亿儿童受到学校停课的影响，这对他们的学习产生了重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/COVID-19-school-closures-hit-poorer-districts-of-Barcelona-hardest-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/COVID-19-school-closures-hit-poorer-districts-of-Barcelona-hardest-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5b4b3cc-c37d-494d-a88a-473356d23165 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 10:26:50 -0400 COVID-19 school closures hit poorer districts of Barcelona hardest, study finds
研究表明诊断错误是死亡和残疾的主要原因美国国家医学院表示，改善医疗保健诊断是道德、专业和公共卫生的当务之急。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Research-shows-diagnostic-error-as-a-leading-cause-of-death-and-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Research-shows-diagnostic-error-as-a-leading-cause-of-death-and-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7caee34-a6da-4065-8c32-be07ed3d48bf Mon, 17 Jul 2023 10:08:40 -0400 Research shows diagnostic error as a leading cause of death and disability
抗药物抗体是否会降低类风湿关节炎治疗的有效性？研究人员检查了抗药物抗体与类风湿关节炎治疗反应之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Are-antidrug-antibodies-reducing-the-efficiency-of-rheumatoid-arthritis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Are-antidrug-antibodies-reducing-the-efficiency-of-rheumatoid-arthritis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=511e9d93-81ea-48d5-9d09-970d1022e332 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 10:02:00 -0400 Are antidrug antibodies reducing the effectiveness of rheumatoid arthritis treatment?
感染关联：神经影像学揭示调查对痴呆风险的影响研究人员比较了痴呆症的神经影像标记物与常见感染的抗体之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/The-infection-connection-investigating-the-impact-on-dementia-risk-neuroimaging-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/The-infection-connection-investigating-the-impact-on-dementia-risk-neuroimaging-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=798234a2-1f50-496f-b208-04950c50849f Mon, 17 Jul 2023 09:13:00 -0400 The infection connection: investigating the impact on dementia risk, neuroimaging reveals
